channel.title: Small problem
channel.description:
hey this is a small problem i guess its about npcdrops.cfg i have some npcs drop alot of stuff like about 10 or so i tryed adding more things to thiere drops the server crashes when i try to load
i think my question would be how to increase npcdrops limit?

item.title: Small problem
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

mostwanted8:

there is a limit i found out if i made the npc drop more then 15 items it crashes server when i run it how can i fix that?

I don’t think so…
take a picture of the error
I’m pretty sure it’s because you used spaces instead of tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Small problem
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

go to npcdrops.tsm and edit drops in there. it goes by npc name . then npc id , then item id : itemamount

make sure u dont put extra spaces or tab wrong or else source wont run

Read full topic

item.title: Small problem
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I don’t think there is a limit. I do however think that you may have incorrectly added some of them. But I’m not 100% certain on anything.

Read full topic
